title: Mjosgard's Redemption Foreshadowed by Otohime's Mercy
theory: The fact that Otohime risks her life to save Mjosgard and accompanies him to Mary Geoise foreshadows his complete transformation from cruel Celestial Dragon to defender of Fish-Men. Her act of mercy plants the seed for one of the series' most dramatic character redemptions.
author: Multiple One Piece fans

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: This theory spoils Mjosgard's character arc up through the Reverie arc where he protects Shirahoshi

evidence: Otohime's compassion toward Mjosgard in episode 545
Mjosgard's later appearance protecting Shirahoshi during the Reverie
His complete personality transformation from arrogant to humble

title: Shirahoshi's First Sea King Summon Sets Up Her Role as Poseidon
theory: The episode where Shirahoshi first unconsciously summons Sea Kings at age 6 establishes her as the Ancient Weapon Poseidon. This power will be crucial to the final war and the fulfillment of the prophecy about a great figure appearing at Fish-Man Island.
author: One Piece community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Confirms Shirahoshi as Poseidon and discusses her role in future events

evidence: Shirahoshi summons five Sea Kings when crying for her mother
Vander Decken IX recognizes her as the legendary mermaid princess
Later confirmation that she is Poseidon, one of the three Ancient Weapons

title: The Cycle of Hatred Theme Mirrors Real-World Reconciliation
theory: Otohime's speech about not passing hatred to children and her decision to save Mjosgard despite the trauma he represents mirrors real-world themes of breaking cycles of hatred and oppression. The episode commentary suggests this is One Piece's most direct commentary on racism, slavery, and reconciliation.
author: Multiple analysts and reviewers

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses themes within the Fish-Man Island flashback arc

The parallel between Fish-Man discrimination and real-world racism

title: Vander Decken's Obsession Explains His Present-Day Actions
theory: The moment Vander Decken IX realizes Shirahoshi is the legendary mermaid princess explains his decade-long stalking and obsession with her in the present timeline. His ancestor's lifelong search for this power drives his actions.
author: One Piece community
